type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

person.ContactType: Contact type - e.g. Emergency contact, Customs contact, Customer contact…

Contact.Description: Contact description free text -  e.g. main, work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…
Contact.Method: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Phone, Email, Fax, Skype, Whatsapp, Viber…
Contact.ContactPoint: Contact coordinates - e.g. phone number, email address, etc.
